title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce in a dream according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a divorce in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. Seeing a divorce in a dream can indicate changes and developments in the dreamer’s life, and it can indicate the death of anxiety and anxiety. Seeing his divorce as a single person means a new life, and divorce can indicate a man leaving his job. Many people use divorce phrases. It is pronounced in many different situations and some people are confused in cases in which the husband did not divorce but the word “husband” was pronounced, and therefore we will explain to you the complete interpretation of the dream of divorce in a dream. Follow us. You dream of seeing divorce for Asami. The interpretation of the dream of divorce is evidence of getting rid of all problems and fears. If the patient is Dreaming of divorcing his wife, this means that the sick person will recover soon. A dream of divorce indicates that the situation has improved. Seeing a girl’s divorce in a dream proves that her situation will improve. Dreaming of seeing a divorce for a single person. A dream of divorce in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she is about to get married. If she sees a divorce In her dream and she is satisfied with it, this means that she will hear the good news. Seeing divorce in a single girl’s dream usually represents sadness and troubles. Dreaming of seeing divorce for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that her husband has divorced her in her dream, then this vision indicates the end of her worries and problems and the payment of her debts. If She finds that she is divorcing her husband, this means that her life has changed positively. Divorce usually indicates a stable marital life. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a divorce. A dream of divorce indicates the approaching date of birth. If a pregnant woman is divorced at home, this means the birth of a boy. As for seeing a divorce while she is happy This indicates that her fetus is fine. A dream of divorce for a man: If an unmarried young man sees divorce in his dream, this means that he will marry a beautiful girl. For a married man who sees divorce in his dream, this means that he or his wife is unemployed. A man’s dream that he divorces his wife indicates Happiness and kindness. Dreaming of seeing a divorce in a dream. If a sick person sees that he has divorced his wife, this indicates his recovery from the disease. Seeing a divorce in a dream is evidence of the collapse of worry, anxiety, and freedom from sorrows. Seeing a friend or girlfriend divorcing in a dream indicates changes and developments for the better. Seeing a divorced girl And she is happy indicates good news. Seeing a divorce for a man may indicate leaving work or joining another job. Seeing a wife divorcing her husband indicates freedom from worry and worry. At the end of our article, we talked to you through the previous lines with sufficient and comprehensive information about the above topic, which is the interpretation of a dream about divorce in Al-Osaimi's dream. We wish you dreams full of goodness and happiness as long as you are in God’s care and care.

title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing gold in a dream is not a good dream. The concept of gold, which is yellow, is considered one of the distinctive colors. Therefore, Ibn Sirin explains that the presence of gold in a dream is evidence of the presence of sustenance, happiness, and a lot of money or distress, anxiety, and sadness, each according to his condition. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single woman It is important to know that seeing gold in the dream of an unmarried girl is interpreted as having a good opportunity to get married and that the husband is righteous and obedient to God. The presence of gold in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that goodness, livelihood, and blessings will come. Whoever sees in her dream that she is wearing a golden crown, the dream is interpreted as that she will soon get married by the command of God. However, if the girl is already engaged, this indicates that her condition has changed for the better, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. What if the girl is in a love story? She saw in her dream that her lover gave her a crown of gold, and this is evidence of this young man’s intention to do good for her and that he will propose to her. It is important to know that an unmarried girl dreams that she is wearing gold It is not a good sign because it may mean that she is subject to more restrictions and loss Her freedom. We chose for you: Gold in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a married womanThe dream of a married woman with gold is interpreted as the arrival of goodness and living in her life by the command of God.In fact, seeing gold for a married woman refers to her male children.In fact, it indicates the presence of legs, bracelets and a gold ring in a dream that she is thinking about married life or her husband.It is important to emphasize that seeing gold in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant is evidence that she will soon become pregnant by the command of God.But if a married woman sees and does not want to get pregnant with gold, it is interpreted by the arrival of property or treasure near her.The joy of a married woman from gold is interpreted by the fact that her children are in good health.If she is not satisfied with the gold, this is interpreted by the presence of many problems in the lives of her male children.But if a married woman receives a gift of gold, this indicates that goodness and blessings will come.If the husband gives his wife a gift of gold in a dream, this indicates the stability of the marital relationship between them and shows his great love for her.Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is wearing gold, this is evidence that she She will give birth to a son by God’s command. But if the ring is framed, this indicates that she needs to get closer to God and make more effort in her worship with God. It is important to know that seeing a pregnant woman with a lot of gold on her way is interpreted as an easy birth by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a man Many interpreters agree that the presence of gold in a man’s dream is an unpleasant vision, with the exception of the necklace. As for seeing the necklace in a man’s dream, it indicates the coming of good or the dreamer’s high status. The necklace on the ring also indicates the dreamer’s success at work, promotion at work, or changing the position to a higher position.

Interpretation Seeing gold in a dream for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of gold is interpreted about the arrival of goodness and living in her life according to God’s command. If the husband gives his wife in a dream a gift of Gold, and this indicates the stability of the marital relationship between them and shows his intense love for her. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is wearing gold, this is evidence that she will give birth to a son by God’s command. But if the ring is with a frame, this indicates that she is in need. To get closer to God and make more effort in her worship with God. It is important to know that seeing a pregnant woman with a lot of gold on her way is interpreted as an easy birth by order of God. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a man. Many interpreters agree that the presence of gold In a man’s dream, it is an unpleasant vision, except for the necklace. As for seeing a necklace in a man’s dream, it indicates the coming of goodness or the dreamer’s high status. The necklace on the communicator also indicates the dreamer’s success at work, a promotion at work, or a change in position to another.

title: Interpretation of seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. Married women, pregnant women, men, young men and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing Sidra Al Muntaha in a dream for a single girl? Seeing a single girl Sidra Al Muntaha in a dream indicates good luck and happiness and brings goodness to the Lord in the future. Seeing a single girl Sidra Al Muntaha in a dream indicates her high morals, the kindness of her heart, and love of people For her. Seeing an unmarried woman of Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream seems to hear the good news soon. Seeing a single girl killing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream shows that she has missed every important opportunity in her life and failed to reach her dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing cigarettes in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing Sidra Seeing a married woman, Sidra, Al-Muntah in a dream indicates the arrival of happiness and joy for her and her family, such as the success of children or the acquisition of abundant money. Seeing a married woman, Sidra, Al-Muntah in a dream is a sign of the collapse of worry and sadness from her life and her ability to solve her problems easily. Seeing a married woman, Sidra, Al-Muntaha, in a dream, it indicates the opening of the doors of much livelihood and abundant goodness for her husband. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman who sees Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream? A divorced woman seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream indicates happy events in her life and God’s compensation for her. Seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream states that it brings her Goodness, blessing, and abundant money. Seeing the final division of Sidra al-Muntaha in a dream. People in the streets are a sign of many things that will make her heart happy. See also: Interpretation of seeing sugar in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees Sidra al-Muntaha in a dream? A man who sees Sidra al-Muntaha in a dream. Receiving happy news and glad tidings for his heart. And the arrival of goodness to him. A man seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream is a sign of achieving great gains and successes in his life and changing his life completely, and a feeling of psychological comfort, reassurance and peace of mind. Seeing Sidra Al-Muntaha falling to the ground in a dream indicates the death of torment and sadness for the dreamer. What is the interpretation of the pregnant woman who sees it? Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman from Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream indicates comfort, loss of fatigue, and facilitation of her birth. Seeing a pregnant woman eating Sidra Al-Muntaha in large quantities indicates great joy and happiness in her life and the coming of goodness with the birth of a new child. Seeing a pregnant woman in Sidra Al-Muntaha in a dream is It indicates the strength of her relationship, her intense love for her husband, and their long struggle to make their children happy. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tall building in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man seeing Sidra Al Muntaha in a dream? A young man seeing Sidra Al Muntaha in a dream indicates happy events in his life and his bright future. Seeing a young man from Sidra Al Muntaha falls in A dream that comes from his hand is an indication of his serious financial crisis and the large number of debts he has. Seeing a young man eating a lot of Sidra al-Muntaha with a beautiful girl and good manners shows his interest in worldly matters.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicken in a dream

preview.html: For the dreamer, it is the correct scientific interpretation to explain the dream of chicken in detail: Chickens are birds that have a unique and wonderful taste. They are completely harmless pet birds. Regarding the dream of this dream, you will explain it in the following lines. Many people want to know what this dream is or what If it is good or bad. We will learn all this by explaining the dream of seeing a chicken in a dream, which is explained in detail in this article, as chickens show an abundance of children, good offspring and an abundance of money, and raw chicken can indicate disasters, misfortunes or sad news. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Sirin for chickens: In his dream, he has several predictions. He said that whoever sees a lot of chickens in the house, this indicates that the owner will obtain a high status. As for whoever sees him slaughtering chickens, it means that his wife or child will suffer from destruction or injury. Whoever sees many chickens laying eggs in his house It means that he will receive money and benefits, or the unmarried young man will marry a beautiful woman. Chicken means servants. Likewise, a chicken and its feathers are evidence of money, grace, and profit, and this means that the dreamer also has many children and many grandchildren. Interpretation of a dream by dreaming of a chicken can lead to the disappearance of stress, sadness, and poverty. Read also: Interpretation of seeing collecting eggs under the chickenInterpretation of a dream One chicken: See the interpretation: A cooked chicken in a dream means that a girl will marry a rich young man and be happy with him. As you see an uncooked chicken eaten in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates the failure of a romantic relationship in her life. Likewise, a person, as if she had eaten the head of a chicken, It indicates the death of someone close to her. A dream about eating chicken legs. For unmarried women, this is a serious accident for them and the dangers they may fall into. Seeing a chicken slaughtered in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will get married without the approval of her parents. If an unmarried woman sees a chicken in her dream, this It means that she will find a new job or is about to get married. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a chick in a girl’s dream is evidence that she will find a friend and help her overcome adversity and difficult stages. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering chicken for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a married chicken: Seeing a cooked chicken in a married woman’s dream means married life Stable, harmony, affection, feelings of respect and deep love. If a married woman sees herself in a dream slaughtering chickens, this may not be good and indicates marital problems and disagreements and the presence of a woman in her husband’s life. This shows another woman in her husband’s life fighting her until her husband returns to invade her again to conquer her. As for seeing a raw chicken in a married woman’s dream, this indicates that she is suffering from many problems, whether with her husband or with her children. However, if he sees in a dream that a married woman’s chicken is not pregnant, then she will give birth to many children in the house. It can symbolize an interpretation Dreams for a married woman watching a chicken portends kindness and money, the fulfillment of her desires and the elimination of stress.Eq

title: Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Nurse in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a hospital is disturbing to whoever sees it, because it often symbolizes illness and adversity, and together we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream for a single woman and its meaning for married and pregnant women, as well as for divorced women, and Ibn Sirin saw in these interpretations.Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of seeing a hospital In a dream, it can indicate tension, anxiety, and the disruption of problems in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a person in a children’s hospital indicates the intensification of his sadness and the greatness of his worries. As for seeing a person inside the house of a madman, it turns out that this visionary person is imprisoned with the corrupt. Whoever sees that he died in the hospital, this is a sign However, his condition will change for the worse, and he will turn away from matters of his religion. If a poor person sees that he has entered the hospital, this indicates that a paragraph is about to end and that he will receive money to compensate him. Whoever sees that he has become a doctor in a hospital, this indicates his mind and wisdom among men. Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a hospital in a dream for a married woman indicates the emergence of things that cause unhappiness and anxiety. If a married woman sees that she has gone to visit someone in the hospital, this indicates that she will become pregnant in the next few days. A married woman who sees her husband entering the hospital appears and feels sad for him. She and her husband are going through difficult days full of difficulties. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband has been admitted to an insane asylum, this indicates his rationality and his ability to manage things wisely. If a married woman sees that she refuses to visit a patient in the hospital, this indicates her ingratitude and extreme cruelty to those around her, but she sees her visit to a patient in the hospital, which indicates the goodness of his heart. And she tries to solve complex problems between the people around her. Seeing a married woman wearing hospital clothes means that she will endure difficulties and worries. If a married woman sees her son lying in the hospital, this indicates that that son is injured. Seeing a married woman leaving the hospital is a good indication that her life with her husband will improve. Also, the wife’s vision of her husband leaving the hospital is good for solving her problems and ending the difficult days she was experiencing. Seeing the hospital and nurses in a dream. If one sees that he is inside a hospital with a number of nurses, this indicates the end of his problems and troubles. And whoever sees that they are inside the hospital and the nurse is smiling at them, it appears It turns their lives from distress to weakness. If the dreamer is a businessman, then seeing the hospital and the nurse’s smile indicates the prosperity of his trade and business. Whoever dreams that he works as a nurse in the hospital, this is a sign of him recovering from an illness in his body or paying off a debt he owes. Seeing a sick nurse in a dream It means that he will soon recover from illnesses. An unmarried girl who sees nurses in a dream indicates that her marriage is approaching and stable. As for a married woman’s dream of nurses, it indicates that she will get rid of the problems that surround her. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about surgery, wounds, and hospitals in a dream. Interpretation of a dream My husband is in the hospital. A married woman’s vision of her husband being admitted to the hospital may indicate...

Whoever sees that he has become a doctor in a hospital, this indicates his mind and wisdom among men. Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a hospital in a dream for a married woman indicates the emergence of things that cause unhappiness and anxiety. If a married woman sees that she has gone to visit someone in the hospital, this indicates that she will become pregnant in the next few days. A married woman who sees her husband entering the hospital appears and feels sad for him. She and her husband are going through difficult days full of difficulties. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband has been admitted to an insane asylum, this indicates his rationality and his ability to manage things wisely. If a married woman sees that she refuses to visit a patient in the hospital, this indicates her ingratitude and extreme cruelty to those around her, but she sees her visit to a patient in the hospital, which indicates the goodness of his heart. And she tries to solve complex problems between the people around her. Seeing a married woman wearing hospital clothes means that she will endure difficulties and worries. If a married woman sees her son lying in the hospital, this indicates that that son is injured. Seeing a married woman leaving the hospital is a good indication that her life with her husband will improve. Also, the wife’s vision of her husband leaving the hospital is good for solving her problems and ending the difficult days she was experiencing. Seeing the hospital and nurses in a dream. If one sees that he is inside a hospital with a number of nurses, this indicates the end of his problems and troubles. And whoever sees that they are inside the hospital and the nurse is smiling at them, it appears It turns their lives from distress to weakness. If the dreamer is a businessman, then seeing the hospital and the nurse’s smile indicates the prosperity of his trade and business. Whoever dreams that he works as a nurse in the hospital, this is a sign of him recovering from an illness in his body or paying off a debt he owes. Seeing a sick nurse in a dream It means that he will soon recover from illnesses. An unmarried girl who sees nurses in a dream indicates that her marriage is approaching and stable. As for a married woman’s dream of nurses, it indicates that she will get rid of the problems that surround her. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about surgery, wounds, and hospitals in a dream. Interpretation of a dream My husband is in the hospital. A married woman’s vision of her husband being admitted to the hospital may indicate...

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a prince for a single and married divorced woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a prince for single and married divorcees, according to Ibn Sirin. The marriage relationship is one of the most wonderful relationships that exist in human life and that occur between people. God Almighty mentioned this relationship in His great book, the Holy Qur’an, which was revealed to our master Muhammad, may God have mercy on him. Bless him and grant him peace, when the Almighty said: {And who has chosen for you wives from among the people that you may live in peace, whether male or female, and the following is the information that a married woman interprets about a dream. . Ibn Sirin, and the following is all the information that revolves around this topic. Interpretation of a dream about the king’s son marrying an unmarried woman. All girls dream of achieving a marriage arrangement and they always love to marry someone who has great value in society so that they can brag about him a lot in front of everyone and among the personalities who want The girl whom she will marry is the king’s son. The following is the interpretation of the dream of marrying the king’s son for single people: An unmarried girl’s dream of marrying the king’s son is evidence of the abundant goodness that will accompany the coming days of her life, God willing. The dream of marrying the king’s son for an unmarried girl indicates that the girl will get... She will receive a lot of sustenance in the coming days of her life. The girl, who suffers from many problems and difficulties in her life, saw the issue of her marriage to the king’s son as a sign of the approaching date when all problems and worries will disappear from her life, God willing. Whoever studies in an educational institution and sees in her dream that the issue of marriage is made by the son of a prince, this is an indication that she will excel a lot in the educational stage in which she is studying and that they will obtain high grades. For the unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she has married the king’s son, this dream indicates that the girl will receive many promotions in her field of work. If the woman dreams that she marries the king’s son, this dream interprets that she will marry a very famous person in society, and she will be proud of her marriage. And the engaged girl who sees this dream, and that she has a legendary wedding, this dream indicates that her fiancé will give her a big wedding and everyone will talk about it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a raging brown horse in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about a prince’s wedding to a married woman. Some dream events cannot be understood by the human mind. This is what makes him look for a special interpretation in the dream he dreamed of, and among the strange dreams is the dream of marrying a married woman, and the following: is all the information regarding the answer to the interpretation of the dream of marrying a prince for a married woman: Dreaming of a woman married to a famous person is a sign of... A woman who suffers from family and marital problems with her husband and sees this dream is a sign that all problems will disappear from her life, God willing. This dream indicates that her husband will obtain a new source of income. It will change the entire course of her life for the better. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the color black in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and the great commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black in a dream: Black is considered one of the colors that indicates sadness and depression, although it is one of the elegant and elegant colors. It is the king of colors as they call it, but seeing the color black in a person’s dream varies depending on its color. The fortuneteller, according to the dreamer’s love for the color black, if he is a fan of the color black, this indicates goodness and nourishment. In this article, we will explain to you in detail what is the interpretation of the dream of seeing black in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing black in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his book The Interpretation of Dreams that Seeing the color black in a dream is a vision that indicates anxiety, sadness, and depression. This vision has different interpretations and implications, and we will mention in the following points the interpretation of the dream of seeing black in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the color black in a dream indicates pain and grief filled with grief, and it could be a sign of illness, death, or loss. The color black indicates negative thoughts and mystery. And the color Black in a dream indicates safety and truth, because judges and lawyers wear it to achieve justice. Ibn Sirin says that the color black in a dream indicates sadness if the dreamer is not accustomed to wearing black clothes. But if the dreamer constantly wears black clothes in black, this indicates that the situation It will change for the better, God willing. If the dreamer is suffering from a health problem or illness, this indicates the death of that dreamer, and God knows best. See also: The dream interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators. The interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl can have many dreams. In her dream, seeing the color black in a dream has many different meanings and interpretations, and through the following lines we will explain to you what is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl dreams of wearing black clothes, this means that she is suffering from a feeling of loneliness and anxiety, especially if She was wearing black on the wedding occasion. If she saw that she was wearing black and became beautiful after wearing it, this indicates that she has personality and confidence. An unmarried woman’s dream that she is wearing a black suit indicates her success and that she will get high grades in her studies or that she will get a promotion in Work. Seeing the color black in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will change the furniture in her room or that she will travel abroad. See also: The dream interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of seeing black in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s dream of black indicates that she is going through a period It is a difficult stage, and this vision has different meanings that we will present to you below in the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream for a married woman. For you as follows: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing black, this indicates a lack of money and she fears the future, and this indicates that she is going through a difficult period in her life. If a married woman sees in her dream that the curtains of the house are black, this means that she still remembers the painful days and suffers from not

title: Learn the meaning of death in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Death in a dreamIt is one of the visions that frighten many people and make them feel uncomfortable, especially if the dreamer sees this vision for himself or one of his loved ones, but seeing death in a dream does not always indicate bad things, and sometimes it is a sign. Well, death is actually a transition from the world. To another.The meaning of death in a dreamSeeing death in a dream often means good. The person who sees his death in a dream is a person for whom God has destined a long life and he must use his long life to worship God and get closer to Him, and if one sees that. If he dreams that he died and then comes back to life, this is an indication that he will commit a great sin and then repent for it. God martyrs him in his own way, for the martyrs are alive with their Lord. If the dreamer sees the death of one of his acquaintances and he is in disagreement with him in reality, this means that their disagreement will end, God willing, and reconciliation will occur between them, and because this dream is a sign of good, it will also be a sign of evil in times of evil. Other, seeing a person dying naked in a dream is an indication that some misfortunes will occur in his life that will disturb his life, as it may be the loss of money or the loss of someone. From his children or demolishing his house. The meaning of death in a dream by Ibn Sirin This dream indicates many indications that the debt will be returned to the debtor, the sick person will be healed and the prisoner will be released from the prisoner’s torment, and it is good news of his martyrdom, and if he sees that he died then he comes. Returning to life, this indicates that he committed a sin and then repented of it, and sometimes it shows that the dreamer is poor, and God will soon give him enough sustenance to compensate him for his previous poverty, and if he sees an already dead person. People come out of their graves and eat everyone's food, because this is an indication that the food is expensive and we would like to point out that what the dead tell us in our dreams is true. Seeing someone who died smiling is actually like that, and if he sees in a dream that he died on a rug, then this Good news that God will extend his provision for him, and whoever sees the death of his son in a dream. It is a sign of his salvation from a problem in reality, and whoever sees the death of his brothers in a dream. His wife in a dream indicates that he will lose his job or that his business will be destroyed. The meaning of a dream about death in a dream for a single woman. Death in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates most of the time that her marriage is approaching, and it also shows that God has given her a long life and indicates that she will soon hear good news, and if Wrapped in a dream, this look portends that she has completely forgotten religion and is busy with worldly matters. In her dream, she saw the death of her father and he was not actually sick, then this is evidence of his long life, but if he was sick, then this indicates his near recovery, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has escaped death, then this is an indication in the dream of the presence of many problems and difficulties. that she faces, but she overcomes them all. You know that he died, so its interpretation is that this person has a long life, and if the dead person was dear to her, then it is good luck that she will get rid of all her worries. The meaning of death in a dream for a married woman Seeing death in a dream for a married woman is a sign
